title: End-to-End Tests
description:
Implement End-to-End Tests for Critical User Workflows

Create comprehensive E2E test coverage for the application's most critical user journeys to ensure functionality and prevent regressions.

Requirements:
- Identify and prioritize critical user workflows (e.g., authentication, checkout, core feature flows)
- Select and configure appropriate E2E testing framework (Playwright, Cypress, or existing framework if already in use)
- Write test scenarios covering happy paths and common error cases for each workflow
- Implement test data setup and teardown procedures
- Configure tests to run in CI/CD pipeline
- Add page object models or component selectors for maintainable test structure
- Include visual regression testing for key UI states where applicable
- Document test coverage and how to run tests locally
- Set up test reporting and failure notifications
- Ensure tests are isolated, deterministic, and can run in parallel

Success Criteria:
- At least 3-5 critical workflows have complete E2E test coverage
- Tests pass consistently in CI environment
- Test execution time is reasonable (< 10 minutes for full suite)
- Clear documentation exists for adding new E2E tests
